issue.title: [Rust] Update library dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8124](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8124). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update rust library dependencies to the latest - except for thrift and sqlparser which require additional work
